description: This file is an HTML document serving as the user interface for a database viewer web application, including CSS styles and JavaScript for client-side interactions to browse and display database tables and data.

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Fetches and displays the list of available databases.

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Refreshes the database list, resets UI state.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Handles user interaction to expand/collapse database details and load tables.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Fetches and displays tables within a selected database.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Fetches and renders data for a selected table.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Constructs HTML for tabular display of data.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Creates HTML for individual cell, handling different data types and truncation.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Expands or collapses cell content for long text or nested objects.
